## Ignore this section {.unnumbered}

**You should ignore this section.**

If you are curious why it's here ... I am creating this website by 
adapting materials that I've used in my course over past semesters. 
The following are files that I am in the midst of adapting to the 
new format.
I am using this page to keep track of the materials as I work through 
adapting them to the new format. Again - you should ignore this page.

-Prof. Rosenthal
